response.overview: Inspired by the bond struck and conversations shared between two strangers in a hospital ward during the pandemic, when no visitors were allowed. The film follows the “Odd Couple” friendship between Rong Liang, a heavily tattooed crew in the local film industry, and Doug, a British expat working in cyber security sales. As they banter and chat over their shared passion for films and their desire to pursue their dreams.
response.title: A Busman's Holiday
